info.title: Woodpecker
info.description: Woodpecker products are tailored to your cold emailing and lead generation needs. We are helping leaders improve the workflow within the team and shape their campaign results.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all prospects added to your Woodpecker account.

delete.description: Deletes one or more prospects from a specific campaign or entire database.

post.description: Adds one or more prospect to the global prospects list.
Add one or more prospects to a specific campaign

get.description: Retrieve a list of campaigns created on your Woodpecker account.
